有时我会有一个有趣的想法，像这样
看这些图片，看已看怎么做这些椅子。
做出椅子不是我想要的，而是
享受！
如何做出这样的椅子
你所需要的：
> 1个旗帜（染色）
> 1个木半砖
> 1个木门
> 2个活板门
> 1个展示栏
如何做出它：
用木半砖和木门做出一把椅子。然后把一个展示栏放在木门的顶部，现在，把你的旗帜放在上面。这样就完成啦！
原文：
I love building. Sometimes I get an interesting idea, like this. Look at the pictures to see how to make these chairs. The chair itself is not my idea, but the other things are. Enjoy!  How to make the banner chair What you need: >1 Banner (dyed) >1 Block >1 Wooden Slab >1 Wooden Door >1 Wooden Trapdoor >1 Item Frame  How to make it: Build a chair with the slab and doors. Then place an item frame on the top of the wooden door, at the inside. Place the block and turn it, one time. Now, place your banner on it. It should look like the one on the photo (except the banner)
